long_description: The REI Becca Bootie slippers feature plush, puffy sheepskin wool collars to spread a wealth of warmth all the way up to your ankles. Supple sheepskin leather uppers offer natural water and odor resistance. Sheepskin wool linings provide warmth, cushioning and moisture management to keep bare or socked feet dry and comfortable. Lightweight, shock-absorbent EVA midsoles cushion every step. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles offer ample traction for indoor use. To clean the REI Becca Bootie slippers, rub with a damp cloth and air dry; use soft brush to revive leather.
short_description: The REI Becca Bootie slippers feature plush, puffy sheepskin wool collars to spread a wealth of warmth all the way up to your ankles.
